name: Return To Life
description:
Return To Life:

You are faced with an angry army of ninjas and certain death. With nowhere to turn, what will you do? Play 'Return To Life' to find out! This was our entry into the Indie Game Labs Jam #5 with the theme 'Death is Just the Beginning'

Credits:

C4LICO (AKA: Jack Maginnes): Gamplay programming in C++ and Blueprint, Character Design and Animation

Danny Johnsen: Level One Music, Level Design, Story Design
